Class Composition

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.environment.Environment
      • Composition

  • public class Composition
extends jason.environment.Environment
    This is the environment of the system, which is a composition. This deals with agent agents and perceptions by using Model.java.
    Author:
    braem
